name: XCUIElementQuery
desc: An object that defines the search criteria a test uses to identify UI elements.

items.name: func children(matching: XCUIElement.ElementType) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches all direct children of the requested type.

items.name: func descendants(matching: XCUIElement.ElementType) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches all descendants of the requested type.

items.name: func containing(NSPredicate) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches elements that contain a descendant that meets the logical conditions of the provided predicate.

items.name: func containing(XCUIElement.ElementType, identifier: String?) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches elements that contain a descendant of the requested type and an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.

items.name: func matching(identifier: String) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches elements that have an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.

items.name: func matching(NSPredicate) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches elements that meet the logical conditions of the provided predicate.

items.name: func matching(XCUIElement.ElementType, identifier: String?) -> XCUIElementQuery
items.desc: Returns a new query that matches elements of the requested type and have an identifying property that matches a provided identifier.

items.name: var allElementsBoundByAccessibilityElement: [XCUIElement]
items.desc: Immediately evaluates the query and returns an array of elements bound to the resulting accessibility elements.

items.name: var allElementsBoundByIndex: [XCUIElement]
items.desc: Immediately evaluates the query and returns an array of elements bound by the index of each result.

items.name: var count: Int
items.desc: Evaluates the query and returns the number of elements that match.

items.name: var element: XCUIElement
items.desc: The query’s single matching element.

items.name: func element(boundBy: Int) -> XCUIElement
items.desc: An element that uses an index into the query’s results to determine which underlying accessibility element to use.

items.name: func element(matching: NSPredicate) -> XCUIElement
items.desc: An element that matches the predicate.

items.name: func element(matching: XCUIElement.ElementType, identifier: String?) -> XCUIElement
items.desc: An element that matches the provided element type and identifier.

items.name: subscript(String) -> XCUIElement
items.desc: Returns a descendant element matching the identifier specified by key.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: Provides debugging information about the query.

items.name: let XCUIIdentifierCloseWindow: String
items.desc: The identifier for a window’s “close” button.

items.name: let XCUIIdentifierFullScreenWindow: String
items.desc: The identifier for a window’s “full screen” button.

items.name: let XCUIIdentifierMinimizeWindow: String
items.desc: The identifier for a window’s “minimize” button.

items.name: let XCUIIdentifierZoomWindow: String
items.desc: The identifier for a window’s “zoom” button.
